column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Riott seems eager to share the customs of Tomra.
Slay Scree gnomes and obtain gnome soulstones.
Deliver the gnome soulstones to Riott.
Use the bottles of Tomran stonebrew on Zigutt's statue.
Speak with Riott.

Lali-ho! Well, dent my helm with a knocker's arse! We've got ourselves a visitor─a <Switch(PlayerParameter(71))><Case(1)>stranger</Case><Case(2)>stranger</Case><Case(3)>strange dwarf</Case><Case(4)>stranger</Case><Case(5)>stranger</Case><Case(6)>stranger</Case><Case(7)>stranger</Case><Case(8)>stranger</Case></Switch> from a strange land!
If I'm to welcome you properly to Tomra, then I'd best be teachin' you our ways, eh? And that starts with payin' respects to Zigutt's statue!

...Ah, you wouldn't know your Riotts from your Ronitts, would you? The “Zigutt” I'm referrin' to is one of our ancestral chiefs─the mightiest warrior in Tholl history! You remember that name, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>.
Now, first things first, we need to prepare the offering. That involves you bringin' me a couple of soulstones from them rock-headed gnomes out in Scree. Try not to get flattened, eh?
First off, we need two soulstones! You've got to take 'em from Scree gnomes, and let me tell you: they ain't goin' to cooperate!
Let's have them soulstones, then!
Now, I'll just get my hammer out here and...<crunch>...ever so delicately...<crack>...grind these into powder!
And there we have it! Some lovely bottles of stonebrew, seasoned with a sprinkling of gnomish soulstone!
It's the soulstone what puts the “stone” in the brew. I mean, how else do you expect a statue to drink it!?
Now for the ceremonial bit. You take these bottles, and empty 'em onto the four sides of Zigutt's statue over there. Every last drop, mind you!
What are you waitin' for? Zigutt must be as parched as a squid in the desert after standin' in that square day after day!
As you pour the stonebrew onto the base of the statue, you almost believe you see a smile flickering across its impassive face...
Aye, nicely done, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>, nicely done!

You may have noticed, but we Tholls like a drink or two. And seein' the great Zigutt unable to hoist a tankard on account of him bein' a stone statue brings a tear to the eye. And so we honor his memory with the brew he loved best.

He was chief of the Tholl during the coming of the Flood─a true dwarf among dwarves! It was him what ousted that bastard Warrior of Light, and brought our people together in a time when division meant death!
Aye, we wouldn't be here now if it weren't for Zigutt. And I thank you for showin' him the proper respect!
